About Chloe C Chotrani

Dancing Landscapes

Move the body. Free the mind. Dancing Landscapes is an embodied exploration with guided facilitation by Chloe. We'll start by connecting within through a gentle awareness practice, making our way into movement to open the body into our wider biosphere, then leading into accessible and structured movement prompts to bring fluidity to our spine and increase our spatial awareness. By now, your body is receptive and ready to improvise freely, deepening both internal and external connections. The intention to feel stability, safety, and freedom in our bodies, using movement as the gateway, and the body as our medium. All abilities welcome.

- One-on-one workshop package of four session
- 60 minutes, fortnightly, for two months
- Catered to your specific needs
